pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, February 13, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local. Update due to inclement weather. Please note change in timings and that some events have been cancelled.

Fredericton, New Brunswick

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of New Brunswick, Blaine Higgs, and representatives from the softwood lumber industry.

Office of the Premier
Chancery Place
675 King Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.

3:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of New Brunswick, Blaine Higgs.

Closed to media.
